person.persName: William Redmon Duncan (Clark County, Kentucky, farmer and Towanda, Illinois, cattle broker)

body.p: Clark County, Kentucky, farmer and Towanda, Illinois, cattle broker. Kentucky native. Married Mary Duncan. Father of Nannie Duncan, Henry C. Duncan, James C. Duncan, and Lizzie Duncan. Farmer in Clark County in 1850 and 1860. Owned twelve enslaved persons in 1850 and fourteen in 1860. Moved to Towanda in 1864. Cattle broker in Towanda in 1865.
